<a id="Polygon2D"></a>

# Polygon2D

**Inherits:** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A 2D polygon.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A Polygon2D is defined by a set of points. Each point is connected to the next, with the final point being connected to the first, resulting in a closed polygon. Polygon2Ds can be filled with color (solid or gradient) or filled with a given texture.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="Polygon2D_property_antialiased"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **antialiased** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_antialiased)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_antialiased**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_antialiased**\ (\ )

If ``true``, polygon edges will be anti-aliased.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_color**\ (\ )

The polygon's fill color. If [texture](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_texture) is set, it will be multiplied by this color. It will also be the default color for vertices not set in [vertex_colors](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_vertex_colors).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_internal_vertex_count"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **internal_vertex_count** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_internal_vertex_count)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_internal_vertex_count**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_internal_vertex_count**\ (\ )

Number of internal vertices, used for UV mapping.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_invert_border"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **invert_border** = `100.0` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_invert_border)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_invert_border**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_invert_border**\ (\ )

Added padding applied to the bounding box when [invert_enabled](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_invert_enabled) is set to ``true``. Setting this value too small may result in a "Bad Polygon" error.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_invert_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **invert_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_invert_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_invert_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_invert_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the polygon will be inverted, containing the area outside the defined points and extending to the [invert_border](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_invert_border).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **offset** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_offset**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_offset**\ (\ )

The offset applied to each vertex.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **polygon** = `PackedVector2Array()` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_polygon)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_polygon**\ (\ value\: [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md)\ )
- [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **get_polygon**\ (\ )

The polygon's list of vertices. The final point will be connected to the first.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_polygons"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Array](Array.md) **polygons** = `[]` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_polygons)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_polygons**\ (\ value\: [Array](Array.md)\ )
- [Array](Array.md) **get_polygons**\ (\ )

The list of polygons, in case more than one is being represented. Every individual polygon is stored as a [PackedInt32Array](PackedInt32Array.md) where each [int](int.md) is an index to a point in [polygon](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_polygon). If empty, this property will be ignored, and the resulting single polygon will be composed of all points in [polygon](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_polygon), using the order they are stored in.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_skeleton"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **skeleton** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_skeleton)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_skeleton**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_skeleton**\ (\ )

Path to a [Skeleton2D](Skeleton2D.md) node used for skeleton-based deformations of this polygon. If empty or invalid, skeletal deformations will not be used.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **texture** [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_texture)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_texture**\ (\ )

The polygon's fill texture. Use [uv](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_uv) to set texture coordinates.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_texture_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **texture_offset** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_texture_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_offset**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_texture_offset**\ (\ )

Amount to offset the polygon's [texture](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_texture). If set to ``Vector2(0, 0)``, the texture's origin (its top-left corner) will be placed at the polygon's position.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_texture_rotation"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **texture_rotation** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_texture_rotation)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_rotation**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_texture_rotation**\ (\ )

The texture's rotation in radians.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_texture_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **texture_scale** = `Vector2(1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_texture_scale)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_scale**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_texture_scale**\ (\ )

Amount to multiply the [uv](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_uv) coordinates when using [texture](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_texture). Larger values make the texture smaller, and vice versa.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_uv"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **uv** = `PackedVector2Array()` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_uv)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_uv**\ (\ value\: [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md)\ )
- [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **get_uv**\ (\ )

Texture coordinates for each vertex of the polygon. There should be one UV value per polygon vertex. If there are fewer, undefined vertices will use ``Vector2(0, 0)``.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_property_vertex_colors"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) **vertex_colors** = `PackedColorArray()` [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_property_vertex_colors)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_vertex_colors**\ (\ value\: [PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md)\ )
- [PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) **get_vertex_colors**\ (\ )

Color for each vertex. Colors are interpolated between vertices, resulting in smooth gradients. There should be one per polygon vertex. If there are fewer, undefined vertices will use [color](Polygon2D.md#Polygon2D_property_color).

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="Polygon2D_method_add_bone"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Adds a bone with the specified `path` and `weights`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_method_clear_bones"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_bones**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_method_clear_bones)

Removes all bones from this **Polygon2D**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **erase_bone**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_method_erase_bone)

Removes the specified bone from this **Polygon2D**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_method_get_bone_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_bone_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_method_get_bone_count)

Returns the number of bones in this **Polygon2D**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_method_get_bone_path"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_bone_path**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_method_get_bone_path)

Returns the path to the node associated with the specified bone.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_method_get_bone_weights"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md) **get_bone_weights**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_method_get_bone_weights)

Returns the weight values of the specified bone.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_method_set_bone_path"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_bone_path**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md), path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_method_set_bone_path)

Sets the path to the node associated with the specified bone.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Polygon2D_method_set_bone_weights"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_bone_weights**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md), weights\: [PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Polygon2D_method_set_bone_weights)

Sets the weight values for the specified bone.
